page.title: 20EMPLOYERS IN Q.HILL & CASSOP
page.content: NEWTONS: Haulage business with 12 lorries.Established 1920.It now employs 22 people.Mr. Newton used to have a petrol station as well. REEVES: A Coxhoe firm recently moved into Quarrington Hill.They operate from an old converted chapel & a former bus garage.They have 8 lorries and employ 13 people but none from our villages. HOLDENS: Another haulage firm .Like the others it hauls dolomite & sand.They also carry spent barley from the Federation Brewery,Newcastle to local farmers to feed cattle.Coal is their main business.Employs 7. N.D.Y: Repair old buses some to sell to small coach firms,some are repaired after accidents.Employs 12 people.
